DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study collect preliminary safety effectiveness data evaluate Toray Satake Balloon Thermal Ablation System ( TSB ) treat subject symptomatic paroxysmal atrial fibrillation resistant antiarrhythmic drug therapy .
DOC.brief_title: Pilot Study Evaluating Toray Satake Balloon Thermal Ablation System Treatment Paroxysmal Atrial Fibrillation
DOC.criteria: Diagnosis recurrent symptomatic paroxysmal atrial fibrillation ≥2 Symptomatic atrial fibrillation episode At least 1 paroxysmal atrial fibrillation episode document ECG device record system 6 month prior enrollment AND At least 1 additional ( total ≥2 ) paroxysmal atrial fibrillation episode document ECG device record system , OR , minimum , physician 's note indicate recurrent symptomatic atrial fibrillation No episode > 7 day Failed respond intolerant ≥1 Class I , II , III IV antiarrhythmic drug Able willing provide inform consent Health Insurance Privacy Portability Act ( HIPAA ) authorization Able willing meet study requirement , include attend postablation procedure assessments visit Left atrium ≥50 mm Chronically use amiodarone 3 month prior enrollment Previous leave atrial ablation surgical treatment atrial fibrillation Left ventricular ejection fraction ( LVEF ) < 35 % New York Heart Association ( NYHA ) Class III IV heart failure History myocardial infarction ( MI ) unstable angina 6 month prior enrollment Multiple exclusion criterion establish overall good health likely study compliance
